config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code uses the defaultEscape value from the database settings to set the search string escape character.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is triggered whenever the getSearchStringEscape method is called or when the CompareLike constructor is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration option is that it determines the escape character used for search strings in the system.
